text: Tarzan and the Jungle Boy is a 1968 American adventure movie directed by Robert Gordon and starring Mike Henry, Rafer Johnson, Aliza Gur, Steve Bond, Ron Gans. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1968 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Tarzan movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Africa
title: Tarzan and the Jungle Boy
